pages.text: $(l)DESCRIPTION: $(br)$()The Swerving Totem is a very special totem used by the Shachath to enhance their reflexes- helping them to have a quicker reaction time, and to dodge projectiles easily.
$(l)OBTAINING: $(br)$()This weapon is uncraftable as you don't have the experience of [REDACTED], though, you can obtain it by killing the Shachath.
